forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The evening settles into Downtown San Francisco under a shroud of mostly cloudy skies, hinting at a potentially cozy night ahead with temperatures hovering around the mild warmth of 57. The gentle westerly breeze carries a whisper of the sea, with gusts occasionally raising their voices—a reminder of the city’s relationship with the bay and the Pacific beyond. As twilight draws near, a blanket of clouds obscures the sun's departure, offering a soft, muted palette that can feel both inviting and introspective.

Looking toward tomorrow, the forecast promises a transformation as the sun emerges, casting golden rays over the city by midday, with a high near a pleasant 65. The southwest winds will remain a steady companion, ensuring a fresh, invigorating air throughout the day. While the fog may linger over the Golden Gate, perhaps teasing a hint of its ghostly presence in the early hours, clarity will undoubtedly win out as the day unfolds. 

In this unfolding scenario, the choice of attire becomes both practical and thoughtful—layers are the way to go. A light jacket will serve well against the evening chill, but come morning, a simple shirt with a cardigan can be the right balance for comfort while exploring. With this delightful weather beckoning, a stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment at a local café, observing the parade of activity and life, could turn into a beautiful evening ritual, amplifying the charm of the vibrant yet tranquil city.
